welcome.title: Welcome to SkateFit
welcome.subtitle: Skateboarding-Specific Fitness
welcome.description: Build the strength, balance and mobility you need to train like a skater and progress like a pro.

features.title: Skate-Specific Training
features.description: Exercises designed for skateboarding strength and balance

features.title: 3 Difficulty Levels
features.description: Progress from beginner to advanced at your own pace

features.title: Follow-Along Videos
features.description: Crystal clear demonstrations for every exercise

difficulty.title: Difficulty Levels
difficulty.description: Each workout has three difficulty options. Choose any level when you start a workout session.
difficulty.proTip: Select your preferred difficulty each time you start a workout

cards.title: Beginner
cards.description: Perfect for getting started. Lower repetitions and lighter weights to build foundation and form.

cards.title: Intermediate
cards.description: Step up your game. Moderate repetitions and medium weights to build strength and endurance.

cards.title: Advanced
cards.description: Challenge yourself. Higher repetitions and heavy weights for maximum gains and performance.

equipment.title: What You'll Need
equipment.description: Simple equipment you probably already have or can easily get.
equipment.proTip: Missing equipment? No worries! Every exercise has alternatives.

tutorial.title: Using Your Workouts
tutorial.description: Simple gestures to navigate through your training sessions.
tutorial.proTip: Watch the entire exercise once before starting to understand the movement pattern.

cards.title: Swipe Between Exercises (← →)
cards.description: Swipe left or right to move through your workout exercises

cards.title: Long Press for Details (HOLD)
cards.description: Long press on the video to see detailed exercise instructions

cards.title: Swipe Down to Exit (↓)
cards.description: Swipe down to leave your workout and return to the main screen
